put.description: Update customer information, context parameter and/or preferred user settings for a task in progress.

parameters.description: The Nimbus specific ID of the task.

parameters.description: Contains all fields which can be updated on a task in progress.

parameters.description: ID of the trigger being deleted.

schema.description: List of all scheduled tasks for the specified service

403.description: Forbidden for the given Service UPN

post.description: Schedule a new outbound call (scheduler entry).

delete.description: Remove a scheduler entry from the system. Only possible, while the scheduler entry is not yet in progress.

parameters.name: SchedulerEntryID
parameters.description: ID of the scheduler entry to be removed.

put.description: Change settings for an already created scheduler entry.

parameters.name: SchedulerEntryID
parameters.description: ID of the scheduler entry to be updated.

get.description: Gets the list of service contacts for external tasks.
Gets the list of distribution priorities for external tasks.

parameters.name: externalTaskId
parameters.description: ID of the External Task being removed

get.description: Gets the list of available address books.
get.summary: Gets the list of available address books
Get contact(s) from an address book
get.description: Returns contacts from an address book.

parameters.name: AddressBook
parameters.description: The address book to get the contact(s) from.

parameters.name: externalIds
parameters.description: External IDs of the contacts to fetch. Optional: If none provided, all contacts will be returned.

post.summary: Add a contact to an address book
post.description: Adds a new contact to a specific address book. The ExternalId is used as reference in further requests.

parameters.name: AddressBook
parameters.description: The addressbook to add the contact to.

parameters.name: contact
parameters.description: The contact to be newly added to the address book.

put.summary: Update a contact in an address book
put.description: Updates a single contact in the specified address book.

parameters.name: AddressBook
parameters.description: The addressbook to update the contact in.

parameters.name: contact
parameters.description: The contact to be updated in the address book.

post.summary: Remove contact(s) from an address books
post.description: Remove one or many contacts from an address book.

parameters.name: AddressBook
parameters.description: The address book to remove the contact from.

parameters.name: externalIds
parameters.description: External IDs identifying contacts to be removed from the address book.

post.description: Remove all contacts in the specified address book.

get.description: Test API access with the current connection.

taskId.description: The Nimbus specific ID of the task.
taskId.title: Task ID

callChainId.description: The Call Chain ID from Microsoft of the task.
callChainId.title: Call Chain ID

event.description: The event which occurred within Nimbus for the task.
event.title: Event

direction.description: Direction of the task in progress in Nimbus (Inbound/Outbound/None).
direction.title: Direction

modality.description: Initial modality of the task in Nimbus.
modality.title: Modality

created.description: Timestamp, when the task has been created.
created.title: Created

terminated.description: Timestamp, when the task has been terminated.

lastConnectedUserId.description: Object ID (AAD) of the last connected user of the task.
lastConnectedUserId.title: ID of last connected user

LastConnectedUserUPN.description: UPN of the last connected user of the task.
LastConnectedUserUPN.title: UPN of last connected user

LastConnectedUserEmail.description: Email of the last connected user of the task.
LastConnectedUserEmail.title: Email of last connected user

referenceId.description: The ID for reference passed by the third-party system.
referenceId.title: Reference ID

callerId.description: Internal ID for the caller in Nimbus. Object ID (AAD) if the caller is known.
callerId.title: Caller ID

callerTelNumber.description: Phone number (E.164) of the caller. Set only for tasks with modality=Audio.
callerTelNumber.title: Caller Telephone Number

microsoftDestinationId.description: Object ID (AAD) of the callee in an outbound task.

destinationId.description: Internal ID of the destination (Outbound) in Nimbus. Object ID (AAD) if the caller is known.

acsId.description: Azure Communication ID of the caller.

isAnonymous.description: Flag set to true, when caller is anonymous.

customerIdentifier.description: Identifier for the customer in all task types.

serviceId.description: Internal ID of the Nimbus service.

serviceDescription.description: Description of the Nimbus service (inherited from Microsoft Teams).

serviceDisplayName.description: Display name of the Nimbus service.

serviceTelNumber.description: Telephone number (E.164) of the Nimbus service.

emailBodyUniqueRichText.description: Body of the email, rich text.

emailBodyUniquePlainText.description: Body of the email, plain text.

emailServiceMailboxUPN.description: UPN of the mailbox assigned to the service.

outboundAttempt.description: Number of attempts to reach the outbound destination.

updatedParameterName.description: Name of the last parameter which was updated.

updatedParameterValue.description: Value of the last parameter which was updated.

TaskInformation.description: Contains information about the customer, custom context parameter and preferred users.

preferredUsers.description: List of preferred Users for the tasks (UPN-Priority).

Customer.description: Object containing all information of the customer.

primaryTelNumber.description: Primary telephone number of the customer.

telNumbers.description: List of additional telephone numbers of the Customer.

customFields.description: List of custom fields of the customer.

name.description: Name of the custom context parameter.

value.description: Value of the custom context parameter.

upn.description: The UPN of the preferred user.

externalId.description: ID of the contact given by the external system.

userPrincipalName.description: User principal name of the contact.

customFields.description: List of custom fields of the contact.

externalId.description: ID of the contact given by the external system.

userPrincipalName.description: User principal name of the contact.

customFields.description: List of custom fields of the contact.

street.description: Street and number of the address.

schedulerEntryId.description: The Nimbus specific ID of the scheduler entry.

event.description: The event which occurred within Nimbus for the scheduled task.
event.title: Event

direction.description: Direction of the task in progress in Nimbus (Inbound/Outbound/None).
direction.title: Direction

modality.description: Initial modality of the task in Nimbus.
modality.title: Modality

ReferenceId.description: The ID for reference passed by the third-party system.

completionReason.description: Outcome of the scheduler entry when terminated.

destination.description: Destination of the scheduler entries with direction "Outbound".

distributionPriority.description: Priority with which the task should be handled in Nimbus.

dueDateTimeUtc.description: Due date and time in UTC: Example: '2020-03-23T11:00:00Z'.

serviceUpn.description: UPN of the service for which the entry is scheduled.

maxAttempts.description: Maximum Attempts to reach the Destination.

attemptTimeoutInSeconds.description: Defines how long Nimbus tries to reach the Destination before the attempt will be stopped.

maxQueueTimeInSeconds.description: Defines how long Nimbus tries to solve the task until the task is considered Limit Reached.

ronaTimeoutInSeconds.description: Defines how long Nimbus tries to reach the user until the task is considered RONA and a new user will be looked for.

ReferenceId.description: The ID for reference passed by the third-party system.

destination.description: Destination of the scheduler entries with direction "Outbound".

distributionPriority.description: Priority with which the task should be handled in Nimbus.

dueDateTimeUtc.description: Due date and time in UTC: Example: '2020-03-23T11:00:00Z'.

maxAttempts.description: Maximum Attempts to reach the Destination.

attemptTimeoutInSeconds.description: Defines how long Nimbus tries to reach the Destination before the attempt will be stopped.

maxQueueTimeInSeconds.description: Defines how long Nimbus tries to solve the task until the task is considered Limit Reached.

ronaTimeoutInSeconds.description: Defines how long Nimbus tries to reach the user until the task is considered RONA and a new user will be looked for.

customerIdentifier.description: Optional unique reporting identifier, anonymous when empty.

distributionPriority.description: Priority with which the task should be handled in Nimbus once it's due.

preferredUsers.description: List of preferred users for the tasks (UPN-Priority).

id.description: The ID of the added external task.

created.description: Timestamp, when the external task has been created.

type.description: The type of the external task.

isAnonymous.description: Flag set to true, when caller is anonymous.

serviceId.description: Internal ID of the Nimbus service.

serviceDescription.description: Description of the Nimbus service (inherited from Microsoft Teams).

serviceDisplayName.description: The display name of the service.

serviceTelNumber.description: The telephone number of the service.

preferredUsers.description: List of preferred users for the tasks (UPN-Priority).
